sentence.text: We identified 22 genes including cellular response to DNA damage stimulus, positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, TP53, adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway, positive regulation of endothelial cell proliferation, transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, nucleosome disassembly, and phosphorylation with non-silent mutations in the cancer Census Genes.

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus
positive regulation of protein phosphorylation
adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway
positive regulation of endothelial cell proliferation
transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
nucleosome disassembly

sentence.text: Five HGCAs harbored either mono-allelic (four HGCAs) or bi-allelic (one HGCA) transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway mutation or 18q loss that had been known as early carcinoma-specific changes.

entity.text: transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway

sentence.text: Our WES data is largely matched with the earlier 'adenoma-carcinoma model' (cellular response to DNA damage stimulus, positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, positive regulation of endothelial cell proliferation and adenylate cyclase-activating G protein-coupled receptor signaling pathway mutations), but there are newly identified transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, regulation of cell growth, G1/S transition of mitotic cell cycle, negative regulation of protein kinase activity, protein phosphorylation, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, EP300, nucleosome disassembly, regulation of cell adhesion and cellular response to mechanical stimulus mutations in this study.
